title: Eric Daman
data: Daman provide costume designs such as the lead character 's suits for this 1998 comedy-drama film written and directed by Tod Williams and starring Adrian Grenier as the title character
Daman assisted in providing clothing designs such as dress mid series of this 1998-2004 American television comedy-drama series
Daman provided the children 's clothing for this 2004 American drama film written and directed by Tod Williams
Daman provided the musical production costumes for this 2005 independent film directed by Ira Sachs
Daman designed the costumes worn by the angry residents of a housing complex in this 2006 film
Daman provided the wardrobe worn by lead Willem Dafoe in this 2007 independent psychological thriller film directed by Henry S. Miller
Daman provided the costume designs since the first season of this American teen drama television series
Daman provided the costume designs for this 2008 drama film about a woman who decides to pursue her dreams after being diagnosed with a terminal illness
Daman provided the costume designs for this 2009 American crime film directed by John Polson and starring Jon Foster , Sophie Traub , Russell Crowe , and Laura Dern
Daman provided the costume designs for this 2012 American teen comedy film written by Max Werner and is the feature directorial debut of Josh Schwartz
Daman provided the costume designs for this 2013 series
section_text: Costume design for film is also among Daman 's credits , the titles being The Adventures of Sebastian Cole , The Door in the Floor , Tenderness , Anamorph , Forty Shades of Blue , The Architect , Trainwreck : My LIfe as an Idiot , Quid-Pro-Quo . Fun Size , opening in theaters in October , 2012 , is Daman 's most recent film design credit . [ 17 ] Television costume design credits for Daman include six seasons of Gossip Girl , and `` The Carrie Diaries '' which is slated to air early 2013 on the CW network .
intro: Eric Daman is a costume designer, fashion model, television personality, and author from New York City. Known for costume design and fashion styling on the American television series Sex and the City and Gossip Girl as well as designs for various products.
